answers.answer: BumpIm waiting for my results and would love to know as well
I found out i had it at 22 weeks and im currently 37 and if its not that High and you watch your sugars it will go away, thats what happen to me
They did your test that early? I'm 27 weeks and just found out :(

I'm currently 34 weeks and I found out I had GD around Halloween. The diet alone wouldn't help my sugar levels, so I'm on insulin. My OB doctor is inducing me a couple weeks early because of having to use insulin
I found out at 32 weeks.... its a pain in the *** bit its exttemely normal.... i was so upset..... it goes away but you will be a high risk for it.... walk alot after eating brings it down

I Found Out I Had It Around 20 Weeks & They Just Prescribed Me Glyburide That I Take Before Breakfast & Before I Go To Bed, & Its Soooo Aggrivating Having To Test My Bloodsugar Through Out The Day, But Other Than That Its No Bother,

question: So just found out i have gestational diabetes. Can anyone who has had this tell me what its like? Please and thank you
title: gestational diabetes
